      <description>Florida is considering a bill that would make the human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine mandatory for public school students. Could this be the cure for the low HPV vaccination rates shown by the Blue Cross Blue Shield Association (BCBSA) Health of America Report?</description>

      <title>What To Do If You Are Worried About Flesh-Eating Bacteria</title>
      <description>As the unexpected and rapid death of an 8-year-old boy in Oregon demonstrated, flesh-eating disease, otherwise known as necrotizing fasciitis, can quickly maim or even kill even the healthiest of people.</description>
      <dc:creator>Bruce Y. Lee, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Bruce Y. Lee, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:uri>https://www.forbes.com/sites/brucelee/</atom:uri>

      <atom:updated>2018-01-28T00:31:00-05:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>As the unexpected and rapid death of an 8-year-old boy in Oregon demonstrated, flesh-eating disease, otherwise known as necrotizing fasciitis, can quickly maim or even kill even the healthiest of people.</content:encoded>

      <title>This Year's Flu Is Nasty And Getting Worse. And Now We've Shut Down The CDC.</title>
      <description>This year's flu is making people sicker than usual, and several healthy young people have died. The latest CDC reports show that rather than peaking in late December, flu cases may be increasing. Shutting down the CDC couldn't come at a worse time.</description>
      <dc:creator>Steven Salzberg, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>

      <atom:updated>2018-01-21T08:00:00-05:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>This year's flu is making people sicker than usual, and several healthy young people have died. The latest CDC reports show that rather than peaking in late December, flu cases may be increasing. Shutting down the CDC couldn't come at a worse time.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/dam/imageserve/377672008/0x600.jpg?fit=scale" medium="image">
